summary: A look at the life and work of the renown architect.
cast: Charles Arnoldi|Barry Diller|Michael Eisner|Rolf Fehlbaum|Hal Foster|Mildred Friedman|Frank Gehry|Bob Geldof|Dennis Hopper|Charles Jencks|Philip Johnson|Thomas Krens|Peter Lewis|Herbert Muschamp|Michael Ovitz|Sydney Pollack|Norman Rosenthal|Edward Ruscha|Esa-Pekka Salonen|Julian Schnabel|Milton Wexler
title: Sketches of Frank Gehry
